review: This has to be THE greatest thing EVER! What did we ever do without this contraption? I thought to myself "I'll buy it and if I don't like it, I can return it, Amazon is good like that." Nope, not going back - EVER! There are so many options...only thing I don't like or maybe just haven't figured out is I can't see previous seasons to some of my shows, only the current ones are available. Otherwise, I love it!
author: Marissa Guerrero

review: Ready to watch right out the box!
author: Angie

review: Great Product. I use it every day.
author: Mark Johnson

review: Works good. Easy to install. I like easy.
author: Dorothy Smith

review: No problem streaming but download is often not in HD despite the fact that it should be.  I spent time with an Amazon tech but the problem continues. My other WiFi device, a Sony DVD player, has a great picture but very inconsistent download capabilities.  I was hoping for a predictable download and a great picture from the Fire TV Stick and I'm not getting them.
author: Martha H. Sigler

review: Very laggy compared to a roku very disappointed
author: JoJuan

review: Very awesome  recomend it to anybody
author: jacob

review: This was one of the best purchases.  It was truly easy to set up and it consistently works well.  I have now been recommending it to others.
author: Cindy "Cindy"
